            John Bailer
          
          
            
          
          
            After a career as an academic statistician including 13
            years as a department chair, I continued to enjoy podcasting
            on Stats+Stories (www.statsandstories.net).

articles.title: Who am I?
articles.contents:
John Bailer's website
          
          
          Home
          About
          Scholarship, Podcasting, and more
          History
          Random Art
          ☰
          
          
      
        
          
            
          
            Who am I?
          
          
            
          
          
            A. John Bailer is emeritus professor of statistics at
            Miami University. He retired after 34 years at Miami
            University where he was university distinguished professor
            and founding chair of the Department of Statistics. He was
            ISI President 2019-2021, and previously served on the ASA
            Board of Directors.He is an ASA Fellow and a fellow in the
            Society for Risk Analysis and the AAAS.
          
          
            
                
                  
                    International Statistical Institute
                  
                
              
                            
                
                  
                    American Statistical Association

            ISI President 2019-2021, and previously served on the ASA
            Board of Directors.He is an ASA Fellow and a fellow in the
            Society for Risk Analysis and the AAAS.
          
        
      
      
          
              
                                
                    
                    International Statistical Institute
                    
                
                                
                    
                    American Statistical Association

            Scholarship, Podcasting and more
